name: SimpleLIFE.in
tag_list: online-shopping, mens-clothing, apparel-store, tshirts-online, shop-online, simplelife
description: Online men's clothing store for India
overview:
http://www.simplelife.in brings men’s clothing online for India. The site is based on the Spree e-commerce platform, and adds several extensions to customize it for the Indian ecommerce scene (e.g. Cash on Delivery, Indian payment gateways, etc).

The site features its own branded simple polo tshirts for easy-going working men. Also featured are several premium international brands like Puma, Van Heusen, ColorPlus, and more.

To customize the online shopping experience for its Indian audience, the site provides free shipping on all products (no order limit), simple no-questions-asked return any time return policy and payment through cash on delivery.

The company was founded by two geeks and a friend with links to the clothing mafia in Tirupur.
